comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool.This contract includes one or more amendments.This contract is a multi-year contract. The consultant shall conduct the Phase I Environmental Site Assessment at Kingston Penitentiary in Kingston, Ontario. Amended following the Phase I site investigation, the consultant will complete the recommended Phase II tasks at a select number of Areas of Potential Environmental Concern (APECs) as outlined in the Work Plan and Cost Estimate for Phase II Environmental Site Assessment.
